description: Validator for the user callflow's data object

can_call_self.description: Toggle whether devices of this use can call each other

can_text_self.description: Toggle whether devices of this use can text each other

custom_sip_headers.description: KV Object where the name is the SIP header and the value is the SIP field

delay.description: How long to delay the endpoint(s) before bridging

fail_on_single_reject.description: If any leg rejects the call, cancel all other legs

suppress_clid.description: Toggle whether to suppress caller ID

timeout.description: Timeout, in seconds, to wait for answer
